channel.title: Js on 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Js on 学习笔记

item.title: 自动生成类插件
item.description: 默认规则选项支持 完全自定义的匹配规则 一次性添加多条规则 如何使用newAutoClass.js if(newAutoClass) { // 添加width、height、margin、padding newAutoClass.addRules({ reg: widthReg, solveFn: commonSolveFn }, { reg: heightReg, solveFn: commonSolveFn }, { reg: marReg, solveFn: marginSolveFn }, { reg: padReg, solveFn: paddingSolveFn }); newAutoClass.run({ unit: 'rem', base: 750 }); }
